live_updates: We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
34782.summary: Customers in the Kaskitayo area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
34782.title: Mar 10 – Calgary (Kaskitayo)| All Services - Outage (Fix in progress)
